languages.text: {n}Покой. Нега ласковым маршем бережно покоряет позиции бастиона вашего тела. Сустав за суставом, мышца за мышцей, пора за порой — вскоре не остается ни миллиметра плоти, не капитулировавшей перед превосходящими силами блаженного забытья.{/n}

{n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Покой. Нега ласковым маршем бережно покоряет позиции бастиона вашего тела. Сустав за суставом, мышца за мышцей, пора за порой — вскоре не остается ни миллиметра плоти, не капитулировавшей перед превосходящими силами блаженного забытья.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Stillness. The bliss gently marches down the bastion of your body, conquering its defences. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — and before long, there is not a millimetre of your flesh that has not surrendered to the overwhelming forces of blessed release.{/n}

{n}Stillness. The bliss gently marches down the bastion of your body, conquering its defences. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — and before long, there is not a millimetre of your flesh that has not surrendered to the overwhelming forces of blessed release.{/n}

{n}The tension leaves your body as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered your entire being to the peaceful bliss of oblivion.{/n}

{n}The tension leaves your body as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered your entire being to the peaceful bliss of oblivion.{/n}

{n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

{n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous immobilisez complètement et sentez la tension quitter lentement votre corps. De vos articulations à vos muscles, de vos muscles à vos pores... Bientôt, le bastion de votre enveloppe charnelle se détache du monde pour s'abandonner à la sérénité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous immobilisez complètement et sentez la tension quitter lentement votre corps. De vos articulations à vos muscles, de vos muscles à vos pores... Bientôt, le bastion de votre enveloppe charnelle se détache du monde pour s'abandonner à la sérénité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tensión abandona poco a poco tu cuerpo mientras te quedas totalmente inmóvil. Articulación a articulación, músculo a músculo, poro a poro... no tardas mucho en rendir el bastión que es tu cuerpo al pacífico éxtasis del olvido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tensión abandona poco a poco tu cuerpo mientras te quedas totalmente inmóvil. Articulación a articulación, músculo a músculo, poro a poro... no tardas mucho en rendir el bastión que es tu cuerpo al pacífico éxtasis del olvido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在浴缸中一动不动，紧绷的身体慢慢放松下来：一个关节接着一个关节，一块肌肉接着一块肌肉，一个毛孔接着一个毛孔。没过多久，你的整个身体都沉浸在了至福的虚无之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在浴缸中一动不动，紧绷的身体慢慢放松下来：一个关节接着一个关节，一块肌肉接着一块肌肉，一个毛孔接着一个毛孔。没过多久，你的整个身体都沉浸在了至福的虚无之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}完全に静寂に身を任せると、緊張がゆっくりと体から抜けていった。関節から関節へ、筋肉から筋肉へ、毛穴から毛穴へ…やがてあなたは、忘却の至福に肉体という名の砦を委ねた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}完全に静寂に身を任せると、緊張がゆっくりと体から抜けていった。関節から関節へ、筋肉から筋肉へ、毛穴から毛穴へ…やがてあなたは、忘却の至福に肉体という名の砦を委ねた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Spannung lässt langsam nach und du wirst völlig ruhig. Gelenk für Gelenk, Muskel für Muskel, Pore für Pore – wenig später hast du die Bastion deines Körpers der Glückseligkeit des Vergessens überlassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Spannung lässt langsam nach und du wirst völlig ruhig. Gelenk für Gelenk, Muskel für Muskel, Pore für Pore – wenig später hast du die Bastion deines Körpers der Glückseligkeit des Vergessens überlassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kendini tamamen hareketsiz kılıyorsun. Gerginlik yavaş yavaş bedeninden kayboluyor. Her bir eklem, her bir kas, her bir gözenek... Çok geçmeden bedeninin zincirlerinden kopuyor ve hiçliğin huzuruna teslim oluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tension slowly retreats as you bring yourself to complete stillness. Joint by joint, muscle by muscle, pore by pore — before long, you have surrendered the bastion of your body to the bliss of oblivion.{/n}
